message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient’s symptoms suggest psychosis and paranoia, which are often associated with schizophrenia. Quetiapine is an antipsychotic medication and is commonly used to treat schizophrenia. Clozapine is another option, but it is typically reserved for cases where other medications have failed due to its potential side effects.
